<The cosmological interpretation
1:
--------------------
Text: Cosmological interpretation of quantum mechanics:  According to this interpretation, the wavefunction for a quantum system describes not some imaginary ensemble of possibilities for what the system might be doing, but rather the actual spatial collection of identical copies of the system that exist in our infinite space.
Triplets:<Cosmological interpretation
3:
--------------------
Text: Cosmological interpretation of quantum mechanics:  Moreover, the quantum uncertainty that you experience simply reflects your inability to self-locate in space, i.e., to know which of your infinitely many copies throughout space is the one having your subjective perceptions.
Triplets:<Cosmological interpretation
